title: Business Proposal
overview: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up to a blind date to scare him away. But plans go awry when he turns out to be her CEO — and makes a proposal.

tv.episodeTitle: Let's do it together, get married
tv.episodeOverview: To appease his grandfather's wishes, Kang Tae-moo agrees to a blind date. Jin Young-seo enlists Shin Ha-ri's help to scare away her latest prospect.
